dialogue.entry: Hold it. You don't seem like a hostile. What is this place?
Mamma Mia! What a strange-a guy! You's inna the Mushroom Kingdom!
...This place is like nothing I've ever come across. Very...different.
A-ha! You's-a from another world! You must-a be from the big World Portal that-a just opened!
That would-a be a the Princess Peach.
I need you to take me to see her.
Sure thing! But-a be careful, lots of mean Goombas and Koopas today!
Don't worry, I'm Weapons Ready. Do those things normally attack on sight?
Only when-a Bowser is up-a to no good.
Could this 'Bowser' be behind what's happening here?
Only one way to find out. Let's pay him a visit.
Ho... This is going to be a long day...
Bwaah! Luigi, how dare you attack me!
The Goombas have-a been attacking all morning! What are you up to Bowser?!
Put an end to this. Now.
You tresspass and threated me! Prepare yourselves!
